lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic overcame fatigue and an inspired opponent to help Serbia beat Kazakhstan 3-2 in their Davis Cup first-round tie and set up a mouth-watering quarter-final clash with holders Britain in July.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Steers Serbia to Last-Eight Clash With Britain
headline.main: Djokovic Steers Serbia to Last-Eight Clash With Britain

snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic overcame fatigue and an inspired opponent to help Serbia beat Kazakhstan 3-2 in their Davis Cup first-round tie and set up a mouth-watering quarter-final clash with holders Britain in July....
